Benchmark.title: government Environment Configuration
Benchmark.description: This file represent the configuration checklist for government Environment Devices.

Rule.title: secpol.msc - Account Policies - Password Policy - Enforce password history
Rule.description: Ensure the value for this parameter is set to "0"

Rule.title: secpol.msc - Account Policies - Password Policy - Maximum password age
Rule.description: Ensure the value for this parameter is set to "28"

Rule.title: secpol.msc - Account Policies - Password Policy - Minimum password age
Rule.description: Ensure the value for this parameter is set to "0"

Rule.title: secpol.msc - Account Policies - Password Policy - Minimum password length
Rule.description: Ensure the value for this parameter is set to "1"

Rule.title: secpol.msc - Account Policies - Password Policy - Password must meet complexity requirements
Rule.description: Ensure the value for this parameter is set to "Enabled"

Rule.title: secpol.msc - Account Policies - Password Policy - Store passwords using reversible encryption
Rule.description: Ensure the value for this parameter is set to "Disabled"

Rule.title: secpol.msc - Local Policies - Audit Policy - Audit account logon events
Rule.description: Enable the Audit Policy for "Success" and "Failure" attempts

Rule.title: secpol.msc - Local Policies - Audit Policy - Audit account management
Rule.description: Enable the Audit Policy for "Success" and "Failure" attempts

Rule.title: secpol.msc - Local Policies - Audit Policy - Audit directory service access
Rule.description: Enable the Audit Policy for "Success" and "Failure" attempts

Rule.title: secpol.msc - Local Policies - Audit Policy - Audit logon events
Rule.description: Enable the Audit Policy for "Success" and "Failure" attempts

Rule.title: secpol.msc - Local Policies - Audit Policy - Audit object access
Rule.description: Enable the Audit Policy for "Success" and "Failure" attempts

Rule.title: secpol.msc - Local Policies - Audit Policy - Audit policy change
Rule.description: Enable the Audit Policy for "Success" and "Failure" attempts

Rule.title: secpol.msc - Local Policies - Audit Policy - Audit privilege use
Rule.description: Enable the Audit Policy for "Success" and "Failure" attempts

Rule.title: secpol.msc - Local Policies - Audit Policy - Audit process tracking
Rule.description: Enable the Audit Policy for "Success" and "Failure" attempts

Rule.title: secpol.msc - Local Policies - Audit Policy - Audit system events
Rule.description: Enable the Audit Policy for "Success" and "Failure" attempts

Rule.title: secpol.msc - Local Policies - User Right Assignment - Access Credential Manager as a trust caller
Rule.description: Ensure the value for this parameter is set to null

Rule.title: secpol.msc - Local Policies - User Right Assignment - Access this computer from the network
Rule.description: Ensure the value for this parameter is set to null

Rule.title: secpol.msc - Local Policies - User Right Assignment - Act as part of the operating system
Rule.description: Ensure the value for this parameter is set to null

Rule.title: secpol.msc - Local Policies - User Right Assignment - Add workstations to domain
Rule.description: Ensure the value for this parameter is set to null

Rule.title: secpol.msc - Local Policies - User Right Assignment - Adjust memory quotas for a process
Rule.description: Ensure the value for this parameter is set to null

Rule.title: secpol.msc - Local Policies - User Right Assignment - Log on locally
Rule.description: Ensure the value for this parameter is set to this values (in order): Administrators Backup Operators Guest Users

Rule.title: secpol.msc - Local Policies - User Right Assignment - Allow log on through Remote Desktop Services
Rule.description: Ensure the value for this parameter is set to null

Rule.title: secpol.msc - Local Policies - User Right Assignment - Back up files and directories
Rule.description: Ensure the value for this parameter is set to null

Rule.title: secpol.msc - Local Policies - User Right Assignment - Bypass traverse checking
Rule.description: Ensure the value for this parameter is set to Everyone

Rule.title: secpol.msc - Local Policies - User Right Assignment - Change the system time

Rule.description: Ensure the value for this parameter is set to null

Rule.description: Ensure the value for this parameter is set to null

Rule.description: Ensure the value for this parameter is set to null

Rule.description: Ensure the value for this parameter is set to null

Rule.description: Ensure the value for this parameter is set to null

Rule.description: Ensure the value for this parameter is set to null

Rule.description: Ensure the value for this parameter is set to this values (in order): Administrators LOCAL SERVICE NETWORK SERVICE SERVICE

Rule.description: Ensure the value for this parameter is set to null

Rule.title: secpol.msc - Local Policies - User Right Assignment - Synchronize directory service data
Rule.description: Ensure the value for this parameter is set to null

Rule.title: secpol.msc - Local Policies - User Right Assignment - Take ownership of files or other objects
Rule.description: Ensure the value for this parameter is set to null

Rule.title: secpol.msc - Local Policies - Security Options - Accounts: Administrator account status
Rule.description: Ensure the value for this parameter is set to "Disabled"

Rule.title: secpol.msc - Local Policies - Security Options - Accounts: Guest account status
Rule.description: Ensure the value for this parameter is set to "Disabled"

Rule.title: secpol.msc - Local Policies - Security Options - Accounts: Limit local account use of blank passwords to console logon only
Rule.description: Ensure the value for this parameter is set to "Enabled"

Rule.title: secpol.msc - Local Policies - Security Options - Accounts: Rename administrator account
Rule.description: Ensure the administrator account has been renamed

Rule.title: secpol.msc - Local Policies - Security Options - Accounts: Rename guest account
Rule.description: Ensure the guest account has been renamed

Rule.title: secpol.msc - Local Policies - Security Options - Audit: Audit the access of global system objects
Rule.description: Ensure the value for this parameter is set to "Enabled"

Rule.title: secpol.msc - Local Policies - Security Options - Audit: Audit the use of Backup and Restore privilege
Rule.description: Ensure the value for this parameter is set to "Enabled"

Rule.title: secpol.msc - Local Policies - Security Options - Audit: Force audit policy subcategory settings (Windows Vista or later) to override audit policy category settings.
Rule.description: Ensure the value for this parameter is set to "Enabled"

Rule.title: secpol.msc - Local Policies - Security Options - Audit: Shut down system immediately if unable to log security audits
Rule.description: Ensure the value for this parameter is set to "Disabled"

Rule.title: secpol.msc - Local Policies - Security Options - DCOM: Machine Access Restrictions in Security Descriptor Definition Language (SDDL) syntax
Rule.description: Ensure the value for this parameter is set to "null" or "Not Defined"

Rule.title: secpol.msc - Local Policies - Security Options - DCOM: Machine Launch Restrictions in Security Descriptor Definition Language (SDDL) syntax
Rule.description: Ensure the value for this parameter is set to "null" or "Not Defined"

Rule.title: secpol.msc - Local Policies - Security Options - Devices: Allow undock without having to log on
Rule.description: Ensure the value for this parameter is set to "Enabled"

Rule.title: secpol.msc - Local Policies - Security Options - Devices: Allowed to format and eject removable media
Rule.description: Ensure the value for this parameter is set to "Not Defined" or "Administrators"

Rule.title: secpol.msc - Local Policies - Security Options - Devices: Prevent users from installing printer drivers when connecting to shared printers
Rule.description: Ensure the value for this parameter is set to "Disabled"

Rule.title: secpol.msc - Local Policies - Security Options - Devices: Restrict CD-ROM access to locally logged-on user only
Rule.description: Ensure the value for this parameter is set to "Disabled" or "Not Defined"

Rule.title: secpol.msc - Local Policies - Security Options - Devices: Restrict floppy access to locally logged-on user only
Rule.description: Ensure the value for this parameter is set to "Disabled" or "Not Defined"

Rule.title: secpol.msc - Local Policies - Security Options - Domain controller: Allow server operators to schedule tasks
Rule.description: Ensure the value for this parameter is set to "Disabled" or "Not Defined"

Rule.title: secpol.msc - Local Policies - Security Options - Domain controller: LDAP server signing requirements
Rule.description: Ensure the value for this parameter is set to "Not Defined"

Rule.title: secpol.msc - Local Policies - Security Options - Domain controller: Refuse machine account password changes
Rule.description: Ensure the value for this parameter is set to "Disabled" or "Not Defined"

Rule.title: secpol.msc - Local Policies - Security Options - Domain member: Digitally encrypt or sign secure channel data (always)
Rule.description: Ensure the value for this parameter is set to "Enabled"

Rule.title: secpol.msc - Local Policies - Security Options - Domain member: Digitally encrypt secure channel data (when possible)
Rule.description: Ensure the value for this parameter is set to "Enabled"

Rule.title: secpol.msc - Local Policies - Security Options - Domain member: Digitally sign secure channel data (when possible)
Rule.description: Ensure the value for this parameter is set to "Enabled"

Rule.title: secpol.msc - Local Policies - Security Options - Domain member: Disable machine account password changes
Rule.description: Ensure the value for this parameter is set to "Disabled"

Rule.title: secpol.msc - Local Policies - Security Options - Domain member: Maximum machine account password age
Rule.description: Ensure the value for this parameter is set to "30"

Rule.title: secpol.msc - Local Policies - Security Options - Domain member: Require strong (Windows 2000 or later) session key
Rule.description: Ensure the value for this parameter is set to "Enabled"

Rule.title: secpol.msc - Local Policies - Security Options - Interactive logon: Display user information when the session is locked
Rule.description: Ensure the value for this parameter is set to "Do not display user information"

Rule.title: secpol.msc - Local Policies - Security Options - Interactive logon: Do not display last user name
Rule.description: Ensure the value for this parameter is set to "Enabled"

Rule.title: secpol.msc - Local Policies - Security Options - Interactive logon: Do not require CTRL+ALT+DEL
Rule.description: Ensure the value for this parameter is set to "Disabled"

Rule.title: secpol.msc - Local Policies - Security Options - Interactive logon: Message text for users attempting to log on
Rule.description: Ensure the value for this parameter is not null

Rule.title: secpol.msc - Local Policies - Security Options - Interactive logon: Message title for users attempting to log on
Rule.description: Ensure the value for this parameter is not null

Rule.title: secpol.msc - Local Policies - Security Options - Interactive logon: Number of previous logons to cache (in case domain controller is not available)
Rule.description: Ensure the value for this parameter is set to "0"

Rule.title: secpol.msc - Local Policies - Security Options - Interactive logon: Prompt user to change password before expiration
Rule.description: Ensure the value for this parameter is set to "5"

Rule.title: secpol.msc - Local Policies - Security Options - Interactive logon: Require Domain Controller authentication to unlock
Rule.description: Ensure the value for this parameter is set to "Disabled"

Rule.title: secpol.msc - Local Policies - Security Options - Interactive logon: Require smart card
Rule.description: Ensure the value for this parameter is set to "Disabled"

Rule.title: secpol.msc - Local Policies - Security Options - Interactive logon: Smart card removal behavior
Rule.description: Ensure the value for this parameter is set to "No Action"

Rule.title: secpol.msc - Local Policies - Security Options - Microsoft network client: Digitally sign communications (always)
Rule.description: Ensure the value for this parameter is set to "Disabled"

Rule.title: secpol.msc - Local Policies - Security Options - Microsoft network client: Digitally sign communications (if server agrees)
Rule.description: Ensure the value for this parameter is set to "Enabled"

Rule.title: secpol.msc - Local Policies - Security Options - Microsoft network client: Send unencrypted password to connect to third-party SMB servers
Rule.description: Ensure the value for this parameter is set to "Disabled"

Rule.title: secpol.msc - Local Policies - Security Options - Microsoft network server: Amount of idle time required before suspending a session
Rule.description: Ensure the value for this parameter is set to "15"

Rule.title: secpol.msc - Local Policies - Security Options - Microsoft network server: Digitally sign communications (always)
Rule.description: Ensure the value for this parameter is set to "Disabled"

Rule.title: secpol.msc - Local Policies - Security Options - Microsoft network server: Digitally sign communications (if client agrees)
Rule.description: Ensure the value for this parameter is set to "Disabled"

Rule.title: secpol.msc - Local Policies - Security Options - Microsoft network server: Server SPN target name validation level
Rule.description: Ensure the value for this parameter is set to "Off" or "Not Defined"

Rule.title: secpol.msc - Local Policies - Security Options - Network access: Allow anonymous SID/name translation
Rule.description: Ensure the value for this parameter is set to "Disabled"

Rule.title: secpol.msc - Local Policies - Security Options - Network access: Do not allow anonymous enumeration of SAM accounts
Rule.description: Ensure the value for this parameter is set to "Enabled"

Rule.title: secpol.msc - Local Policies - Security Options - Network access: Do not allow anonymous enumeration of SAM accounts and shares
Rule.description: Ensure the value for this parameter is set to "Enabled"

Rule.title: secpol.msc - Local Policies - Security Options - Network access: Do not allow storage of passwords and credentials for network authentication
Rule.description: Ensure the value for this parameter is set to "Enabled"

Rule.title: secpol.msc - Local Policies - Security Options - Network access: Let Everyone permissions apply to anonymous users
Rule.description: Ensure the value for this parameter is set to "Disabled"

Rule.title: secpol.msc - Local Policies - Security Options - Network access: Named pipes that can be accessed anonymously
Rule.description: Ensure the value for this parameter is set to null

Rule.title: secpol.msc - Local Policies - Security Options - Network access: Remotely accessible registry paths
Rule.description: Ensure the value for this parameter is set to null

Rule.title: secpol.msc - Local Policies - Security Options - Network access: Remotely accessible registry paths and subpaths
Rule.description: Ensure the value for this parameter is set to null

Rule.title: secpol.msc - Local Policies - Security Options - Network access: Restrict anonymous access to Named Pipes and Shares
Rule.description: Ensure the value for this parameter is set to "Enabled"

Rule.title: secpol.msc - Local Policies - Security Options - Network access: Shares that can be accessed anonymously
Rule.description: Ensure the value for this parameter is set to null or "Not Defined"

Rule.title: secpol.msc - Local Policies - Security Options - Network access: Sharing and security model for local accounts
Rule.description: Ensure the value for this parameter is set to "Classic - local users authenticate as themselves"

Rule.title: secpol.msc - Local Policies - Security Options - Network security: Allow Local System to use computer identity for NTLM
Rule.description: Ensure the value for this parameter is set to "Not Defined" or "Disabled"

Rule.title: secpol.msc - Local Policies - Security Options - Network security: Allow LocalSystem NULL session fallback
Rule.description: Ensure the value for this parameter is set to "Not Defined" or "Disabled"

Rule.title: secpol.msc - Local Policies - Security Options - Network security: Allow PKU2U authentication requests to this computer to use online identities.
Rule.description: Ensure the value for this parameter is set to "Not Defined" or "Disabled"

Rule.title: secpol.msc - Local Policies - Security Options - Network security: Configure encryption types allowed for Kerberos
Rule.description: Ensure the value for this parameter is set to "Not Defined" or "No minimum"

Rule.title: secpol.msc - Local Policies - Security Options - Network security: Do not store LAN Manager hash value on next password change
Rule.description: Ensure the value for this parameter is set to "Enabled"

Rule.title: secpol.msc - Local Policies - Security Options - Network security: Force logoff when logon hours expire
Rule.description: Ensure the value for this parameter is set to "Disabled"

Rule.title: secpol.msc - Local Policies - Security Options - Network security: LAN Manager authentication level
Rule.description: Ensure the value for this parameter is set to "Not Defined" or "Send LM NTLM responses"

Rule.title: secpol.msc - Local Policies - Security Options - Network security: Minimum session security for NTLM SSP based (including secure RPC) clients
Rule.description: Ensure the value for this parameter is set to "Require 128-bit encryption"

Rule.title: secpol.msc - Local Policies - Security Options - Network security: Minimum session security for NTLM SSP based (including secure RPC) servers
Rule.description: Ensure the value for this parameter is set to "Require 128-bit encryption"

Rule.title: secpol.msc - Local Policies - Security Options - Network security: Restrict NTLM: Add remote server exceptions for NTLM authentication
Rule.description: Ensure the value for this parameter is set to null or "Not Defined"

Rule.title: secpol.msc - Local Policies - Security Options - Network security: Restrict NTLM: Add server exceptions in this domain
Rule.description: Ensure the value for this parameter is set to null or "Not Defined"

Rule.title: secpol.msc - Local Policies - Security Options - Network security: Restrict NTLM: Audit Incoming NTLM Traffic
Rule.description: Ensure the value for this parameter is set to "Disable" or "Not Defined"

Rule.title: secpol.msc - Local Policies - Security Options - Network security: Restrict NTLM: Audit NTLM authentication in this domain
Rule.description: Ensure the value for this parameter is set to "Disable" or "Not Defined"

Rule.title: secpol.msc - Local Policies - Security Options - Network security: Restrict NTLM: Incoming NTLM traffic
Rule.description: Ensure the value for this parameter is set to "Allow all" or "Not Defined"

Rule.title: secpol.msc - Local Policies - Security Options - Network security: Restrict NTLM: NTLM authentication in this domain
Rule.description: Ensure the value for this parameter is set to "Disable" or "Not Defined"

Rule.title: secpol.msc - Local Policies - Security Options - Network security: Restrict NTLM: Outgoing NTLM traffic to remote servers
Rule.description: Ensure the value for this parameter is set to "Allow all" or "Not Defined"

Rule.title: secpol.msc - Local Policies - Security Options - Recovery console: Allow automatic administrative logon
Rule.description: Ensure the value for this parameter is set to "Disabled"

Rule.title: secpol.msc - Local Policies - Security Options - Recovery console: Allow floppy copy and access to all drives and all folders
Rule.description: Ensure the value for this parameter is set to "Disabled"

Rule.title: secpol.msc - Local Policies - Security Options - Shutdown: Allow system to be shut down without having to log on
Rule.description: Ensure the value for this parameter is set to "Enabled"

Rule.title: secpol.msc - Local Policies - Security Options - Shutdown: Clear virtual memory pagefile
Rule.description: Ensure the value for this parameter is set to "Enabled"

Rule.title: secpol.msc - Local Policies - Security Options - System Cryptography: Force strong key protection for user keys stored on the computer
Rule.description: Ensure the value for this parameter is set to "User must enter a password each time they use a key"

Rule.title: secpol.msc - Local Policies - Security Options - System cryptography: Use FIPS 140 compliant cryptographic algorithms, including encryption, hashing and signing algorithms
Rule.description: Ensure the value for this parameter is set to "Enabled"
